Title: Asus ROG Swift PG258Q 24.5" Full HD eSports Gaming Monitor
Availability: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
Description:
[["GET SWIFT. BE UNBEATABLE. ROG Swift PG258Q is all about speed — making it the perfect monitor for eSports and fast-paced action games. This Full HD monitor is the fastest ever, with a 240Hz native refresh rate, 1ms response time and NVIDIA® G-SYNC technology for silky-smooth gameplay and ultra-realistic visuals. On top of that, Swift PG258Q has distinct ROG-inspired design elements that let everyone know that this is no ordinary gaming monitor. INCREDIBLY FAST 240HZ REFRESH RATE ROG Swift PG258Q's astonishing 240Hz native refresh rate makes it twice as fast as conventional 120Hz monitors. You'll experience amazingly -fluid gaming visuals, giving you the upper hand in first-person shooters, racing, real-time strategy and sports titles. There will be no break in the action! NVIDIA® G-SYNCTM TECHNOLOGY WITH ULTRA LOW MOTION BLUR Coupling ROG Swift PG258Q's 240Hz refresh rate with NVIDIA G-SYNC technology results in the smoothest, fastest, most breathtaking gaming imaginable. G-SYNC synchronizes Swift PG258Q's refresh rate to the GeForce GTX graphics card in your PC or laptop to eliminate screen tearing and to minimize display stutter. There's also the Ultra Low Motion Blur (ULMB) technology to make objects in motion look sharper, so gameplay is more fluid and responsive. 1MS RAPID RESPONSE TIME ROG Swift PG258Q is the fastest in its class, with a 1ms gray-to-gray response time to completely eliminate smearing and motion blur. It's especially useful in fast- paced games – so you can take corners like a pro race car driver, or make that impossible headshot. PRESENT GAMING AESTHETIC ROG Swift PG258Q has a futuristic, gaming-inspired design featuring strong and bold lines, as well as built-in lighting effects on its stand to add ambience to your gaming set up. CUSTOMIZABLE LIGHT SIGNATURE Light Signature lets you create and customize ROG Swift PG258Q's light projection effects. It includes two ROG logo covers, and three blank covers that you can customize with a marker to create your own unique light projections, to shine against your desktop surface.
				    	
					", 'Asus ROG Swift PG258Q 24.5" Full HD eSports Gaming Monitor
				    	
					']]

Title: Asus 27 Inch ROG Swift Gaming LED Monitor - PG279Q
Availability: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
Description:
[["Asus PG279Q monitor is here to offer the best gaming experience. Asus gaming monitor lets you enjoy greater image detail and clarity. The ASUS PG279Q 27 Inch ROG Swift Gaming LED Monitor features a WQHD IPS panel with a 165Hz refresh rate. It is incorporated with NVIDIA G SYNC technology that synchronizes the display's refresh rate to the GPU for smooth visuals and lag free gameplay. The Asus PG279Q monitor features 2K WQHD display for highly detailed visuals and more onscreen space. It represents a new generation display with WQHD resolution of 2560 x 1440 pixels that delivers four times the resolution of 720p. Furthermore, the display has a pixel density of 109 pixels per inch. Indulge in the best quality of content with lifelike detail with 4ms response time and 350cd sq. m. brightness. This monitor features the latest technologies and design that will make you victorious in the professional gaming arena. Physical Features Key Features Type: LED Size: 27 Inch Resolution: 2560 x 1440 Brightness: 350 cd/m Response time: 4ms Exceptional Display and Design for Smooth Gameplay This WQHD monitor offers 77 percent more onscreen desktop space than standard Full HD displays Employs ASUS Ultra Low Blue Light filters to protect you from harmful blue light Flicker free technology reduces instances of eye strain and other damaging effects World first 165Hz refresh rate and 4ms response time provides a steady visual Features a narrow bezel design for seamless multi display setups Cooling of the Asus monitor is aided by a Smart Air Venting Design Includes DisplayPort 1.2 and HDMI ports besides WQHD input IPS Technology for Accurate Color With 100 percent sRGB color gamut, the Asus ROG Swift PG279Q gaming monitor gives you superior images Experience outstanding color quality with 1,000:1 contrast ratio A wide 178 degree viewing angle ensures minimal distortion and color shift NVIDIA G SYNC Technology The Asus gaming monitor incorporates NVIDIA G SYNC display technology for breathtaking gaming This feature synchronizes the monitor's refresh rate to the GPU in your GeForce GTX powered PC Exclusive GameVisual Technology by Asus The Asus monitor includes six preset display modes to optimize visuals for different types of content This feature can be easily accessed through a hotkey or the On Screen Display settings menu
				    	
					", 'ASUS 27 Inch ROG Swift Gaming LED Monitor
				    	
					']]

Title: Asus 24 Inch WideScreen 3D capable Gaming Monitor [VG248QE]
Description: [['Ultra-smooth action', '144Hz rapid refresh rate with 1ms response time', 'True-to-life pictures powered by LED', '80,000,000:1 ASUS Smart Contrast Ratio', 'Dynamically enhances the display’s contrast by adjusting the luminance ', '\nof the backlight to achieve the darkest black and brightest white – delivering lifelike images', 'Splendid Video Intelligence Technology', 'The exclusive Splendid Video Intelligence Technology optimizes video performance and image fidelity by enhancing color, brightness, contrast, and sharpness. 6 preset video modes (Scenery, Theater, Game, Night View, sRGB and Standard) can be selected via a hotkey.', 'User-friendly gaming experience design', 'As with most ASUS displays, the VG248QE has an ergonomic design, with tilt, swivel, pivot and height adjustment to give users a comfortable viewing experience.', 'Extensive connectivity and built-in stereo speaker for multimedia enjoyment', 'The VG248QE is compatible with the NVIDIA 3D Vision 2 kit** through DisplayPort and dual-link DVI, providing support across three Full HD displays for an immersive multi-display 3D gaming experience. DisplayPort, HDMI, and Dual-link DVI-D ports ensure extensive connectivity and compatibility with a variety of multimedia devices including Blu-ray disc players or game consoles; while built-in 2W stereo speakers further add to an immersive home entertainment experience.', 'Uncompromised 3D immersion', 'The VG248QE is compatible with the NVIDIA 3D Vision 2 kit**. Through NVIDIA 3D Vision 2 glasses technology, it instantly takes you into another dimension - transforming all your gaming experiences and movies to 3D. Also with the latest NVIDIA 3D LightBoost Technology, user can enjoy twice the brightness of conventional 3D technology in 3D mode with zero increase in total energy consumption. ', 'Product Features:', 'Display', 'Video Feature', 'I/O Ports', 'Accessories', 'Dimensions']]

Title: CORSAIR MM300 Anti-Fray Cloth Gaming Mouse Pad - Designed for Maximum Control - Extended
Availability: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
Description: [['Corsair Gaming Mouse Pad features a durable anti-friction design. Corsair Mm300 Mouse Pad is optimized for gaming mice.The Corsair Mm300 Anti-fray Cloth Extended Gaming Mouse Pad is a great gaming companion. Made from quality cloth, the Corsair Mm300 has the dimensions of 930mm x 300mm x 3mm. The smooth cloth surface has low friction properties that prevent skidding. Timing and precision in gaming is everything, and it is the difference between a win and a loss. Speeding up your reaction times is the textile weave, specifically made to promote fast reflexes. It also increases accuracy, allowing for extremely precise targeting even up to a pixel. Preventing the movement of the mouse pad is an anti-skid rubber base.', '930mm x 300mm x 3mm', 'Optimized For High-DPI gaming mice', 'Material Cloth', 'While using any mouse on the gaming pad works just fine, it is made to be used alongside some of them. Laser and optical gaming mice allow you to use the Mm300 to its full potential. It is also highly optimized for high-DPI gaming mice.', 'Wear and tear are a natural part of any gaming mouse pad, especially after a lot of use. Reinforced stitched edges of this Corsair mouse pad create a sturdy border frame. This creates an anti-fray surface, which resists peeling.']]

Title: Asus RT-N12HP B1 High Power Wireless 3-in-1 Router/Access Point/Range Extender - N300
Availability: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
Description:
[['"The Asus RT N12HP High Power Wireless N300 3 in 1 Router/AP/Range Extender is an all in one device that is capable of delivering excellent wireless connectivity all across your home or office. The advanced device is not just a superior router, but also doubles up as an access point (AP), and a range extender. It comes with two powerful 9dBi antennas and a signal amplifier that drastically increases the coverage of wireless signals. The router is capable of producing Net speeds of up to 300Mbps, when used with devices with 802.11n protocol. It is also backwards compatible with 802.11b, g devices. The device has an operating frequency of 2.4GHz. For security of your network, it enables 64bit WEP, 128bit WPA2 PSK, WEP, WPA PSK, WPA2 Enterprise, and WPA Enterprise encryptions with WPS support. The router is designed to be compatible with Windows, Mac, and Linux operating systems. Being IPv6 enabled; the router can work with newer wireless devices as well. It lets you create multiple SSID’s for flexible wireless access controls that can be decided by you. Setting up the device is a breeze, and can be done with your WiFi enabled computers or tabs in under 30 seconds. The EZ Switch onboard the router lets you switch between the router, AP, and repeater modes with the flick of a button. The unit weighs just 320g and has dimensions measuring 179 x 128 x 28cm. Physical Features Key Features 320 g. IEEE 802.11b/g/n 3/3u/IPv4/IPv6 Long Operating Range The Asus RT N12HP High Power Wireless N300 3 in 1 Router/AP/Range Extender has an efficient, unique design that drastically enhances wireless quality and signal coverage with it’s built in signal amplifier and the powerful 9dBi antennas. The device enhances signal strength, while almost doubling the range.
				    	
					', 'Asus RT-N12HP High Power Wireless-N300 3-in-1 Router/AP/Range Extender
				    	
					']]
